alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 2:51PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Paz and north central Yuma Counties through 345 PM MST... At 250 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Yuma Proving Ground, or 22 miles north of Martinez Lake, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yuma Proving Ground. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 62 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central La Paz; Kofa; Parker Valley
